com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.subordinate.builder

Class SubordinateBuilder.ActionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.subordinate.builder.SubordinateBuilder.ActionBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    SubordinateBuilder

    public static class SubordinateBuilder.ActionBuilder
extends Object
    Helper class to build the actions to be executed on the subordinate control.
